name: AMQP Sender Tool
semantic_context: Sends a raw-message via AMQP 1.0, executed once per item
natural_language_description: 这是 AMQP Sender Tool 节点。主要用于: Sends a raw-message via AMQP 1.0, executed once per item

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Sends a raw-message via AMQP 1.0, executed once per item
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Sends a raw-message via AMQP 1.0, executed once per item | (必填项)

sink.name: sink
sink.description: Name of the queue of topic to publish to
sink.natural_language_description: 参数名: Queue / Topic | 作用: Name of the queue of topic to publish to

headerParametersJson.name: headerParametersJson
headerParametersJson.description: Header parameters as JSON (flat object). Sent as application_properties in amqp-message meta info.
headerParametersJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Headers | 作用: Header parameters as JSON (flat object). Sent as application_properties in amqp-message meta info.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: containerId (值: None) - Will be used to pass to the RHEA Backend as container_id
dataAsObject (值: None) - Whether to send the data as an object
reconnect (值: None) - Whether to automatically reconnect if disconnected
reconnectLimit (值: None) - Maximum number of reconnect attempts
sendOnlyProperty (值: None) - The only property to send. If empty the whole item will be sent.
